Self.Wiki: Defines parameters related to item lots.

lots_dropped_order.Wiki: Determines the order lots are granted.

lots_dropped_num.Wiki: Number of lots this itemLot will provide.

chance_lot_0.Wiki: The base percentage for this item.\nEach base percentage is added together, the result is the overall chance for an item to drop for the itemlot.\nThen during a second roll, the individual percentages are used to determine which item to drop.
